# <a name="add-emojis-or-gifs-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="2c126-102">在 web 上的 Outlook 中新增 emoji 或 Gif</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c126-102">Add emojis or GIFs in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="2c126-103">回復現有的電子郵件，或選取 [**新增郵件**]。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c126-103">Reply to an existing email or select **New message**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2c126-104">選取笑臉</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c126-104">Select the smiley face</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="2c126-105">在 [撰寫] 視窗的底部，開啟 [運算式] 窗格。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c126-105">at the bottom of the compose window to open the Expressions pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="2c126-106">搜尋並選擇您想要插入的表情符號或 GIF。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c126-106">Search for and choose the emoji or GIF you want to insert.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="2c126-107">如需詳細資訊，請參閱[在網頁上的 Outlook 中自訂您的電子郵件](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="2c126-107">For more information, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
